pkgmetadata.longdescription: 'DataSHIELD' Implementation on Local Datasets // 'DataSHIELD' is an infrastructure and series of R packages that enables the remote and 'non-disclosive' analysis of sensitive research data. This 'DataSHIELD Interface' implementation is for analyzing datasets living in the current R session. The purpose of this is primarily for lightweight 'DataSHIELD' analysis package development.
